cafe_shifts.title: Café shifts
cafe_shifts.description_long_text: Here you can view and sign up for café shifts. Click a shift in the calendar to see details and sign up if available.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Orange: your shifts. Green: shifts taken by others. Blue: available shifts.
faq.q2: Who can work in the café?
faq.a2: All members of the F-guild are welcome to work in the café.
faq.a3: Contact the Head of the Café or the Cardinal Beetle at cafe@fsektionen.se.
